name: Bat-Traveler
description:
This small puzzle-platformer game was made for the Weekly-Jam 42 (Theme: Time-Travel).

Currently there's 6 level's so far, but soon there will be more - (because of time pressure)  every level can be already selected in the menu so far.  

- Controls:                          

Left arrow key: Move left

Right arrow key: move right

Space key: Jump                                                                                                                                                         

R key: Restart 

X key: Spit

Shift key: Raise Wings

F2 key: Restart game

Enjoy
